title: Moon and Wall Encrustations, Pultneyville, New York
marks: Signature and Date LRC below sheet on mount, in pencil: [MINOR WHITE
description: abstract image; crackling on a dark surface with vertical streaks giving the illusion of waves on water; round, light-colored element at top center looks similar to a moon
